titles.title: To apply the rates of duty effective after December 31, 1994, to certain water resistant wool trousers that were entered, or withdrawn from warehouse for consumption, after December 31, 1988, and before January 1, 1995.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 7/29/1997--Introduced. Applies the rates of duty effective after December 31, 1994, under the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to certain water resistant wool trousers that were entered, or withdrawn from warehouse for consumption, after December 31, 1988, and before January 1, 1995.
